data.feedback: Comprehensive verification by reading actual codebase files confirms all filesToModify exist with clear patterns, filesToCreate paths are valid, backend API endpoints align perfectly with proposed frontend endpoints, and stories follow the established Clean Architecture patterns (Equatable entities, sealed classes, UseCase pattern, BLoC state management).
suggestions: Consider adding a SharingSearchUsers event handler in Story 3 for the user search functionality needed in AddFriendDialog
